comments: Ivey (DET) reaches in and avoids making contact with Ball (CHA) during the drive.
Burks (DET) briefly places a forearm on Ball's (CHA) side during the drive and marginal contact occurs with Ball's right arm as he releases the pass.
Ivey (DET) contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot and the contact to his right arm after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Bey (DET) dislodges Plumlee (CHA) from his rebounding position, which affects his ability to pursue the loose ball.
Duren (DET) establishes himself in McDaniels' (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact during the screen.
Duren (DET) gathers the ball and releases his dribble prior to his second step.
Plumlee (CHA) makes marginal contact with Duren's (DET) right arm during his finish at the basket.
Duren (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.
Bogdanovic (DET) initiates contact with Ball's (CHA) body that affects his SQBR during the driving shot attempt.
Ivey (DET) and Plumlee (CHA) come together as the former releases the pass and marginal body contact occurs.
Duren (DET) shuffles his feet at the start of his dribble.
Plumlee (CHA) makes contact with Duren's (DET) wrist and affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Duren (DET) deflects the ball OOB.
Plumlee (CHA) is absorbing the initial contact that occurs with Burks (DET) and incidental contact occurs as Burks attempts to move over the screen.
Bey (DET) and Plumlee (CHA) mutually engage and immediately disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Plumlee (CHA) does not release the in-bounds pass within 5 seconds.
Washington (CHA) commits a take foul on Burks (DET).
Ivey (DET) contests Ball's (CHA) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Burks (DET).
Smith Jr. (CHA) steps over the plane of the 3-point line prior to Burks (DET) releasing his free throw attempt.
